name: active_listings
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool airdna.
Tool description: API for Short-Term Rental Data Analytics | Vrbo & Airbnb Data | Rentalizer
API description: Fetches active rental listings from the AirDNA API for a specified location and time period.

location.description: The location code for which to retrieve active rental listings.

start_year.description: The starting year for the time period.

start_month.description: The starting month for the time period.

number_of_months.description: The number of months from the start date for which to retrieve data.
